name: Slamdunk
0:
”Alexa, ask slam dunk for the last game of Lakers”
”Alexa, open slam dunk”
”Alexa, ask slam dunk for a fun fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: slam dunk
des:
Slam Dunk is a chat bot skill that provides information about NBA teams' schedule, scores and standings. It also knows some fun facts. During your first use, the skill will ask for your first name and your favourite NBA team (it can help you chose one). Then it provides personalized content.

We are working on adding some more interesting features in skill, so stay tuned for more. Till then, enjoy!

*Disclaimer: We are not associated with the official National Basketball Association of USA.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
